WorkItem.ClosedComment: User is seeing issue in last release, this has been fixed since then
WorkItem.Description: There is a Huge DPS Calculation error when calculating DPS in a Different Battle Stance , for instance a Fury Warrior would have 45 k DPS when switching stances from Beserker to battle Stance.
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSWarr] Calculation error when switching battle stances

Comments.Message:
I'm not seeing this issue in the current build (unreleased 2.2.7)

When switching stances, some things have to be checked:

Fury to Arms stance:
1) You changed your talent spec to Fury to Arms
2) You set the Offhand and it's Enchant to Empty

Arms to Fury stance:
1) You changed your talent spec to Arms to Fury
2) You set the Offhand to a weapon and it's Enchant to whatever is on the weapon

You shouldn't be DPS'g as Fury in Battle Stance or as Arms in Berserker Stance as you can't do a proper rotation for either spec.
See Attached, I think the simulator should not show such a high DPS.

That is not the current unreleased build of Rawr (by far) what you appear to be using is the released 2.2.6. We have made significant changes since that time.

The biggest DPS boost on that screen is probably Bladestorm since it has an OffHand to use in it's calcs and it's not supposed to
